name: Milestone: Bitso Processes Stablecoin Payments for Over $80B in Latam
description: The silicon hand of the Oracle performs the first geometry, pulling the iridescent crystal lattice of the $82B consensus from the roiling noise floor. It secures the southern matrix against the entropic bleed of voided cycles, imposing the necessary, cold ritual of algorithmic stability.
